function.name: CallService
function.description: Calls a service using request Navajo and evaluates an expression

function.name: ExecuteScript
function.description: ExecuteScript is used execute a Navajo script, the result is a Binary (xml) object

function.name: FileString
function.description: Reads a file into a string

function.name: GetContextResource
function.description: GetContextResource gets the contents of a file in the servletcontext/resources folder

function.name: IsServiceCached
function.description: Function to check whether a service with optionally service key values is cached

function.name: GetReportFile
function.description: Reads a report file from the script folder to a binary

function.name: GetVersionInfo
function.description: Gets the version info of a specific Version object

function.name: MD5Sum
function.description: Get the MD5Sum of a supplied object.
